notes: The opening partnership of 225 by Chudasama and Otieno is a new world record for one-day internationals. (Previous 1st wicket record: 212, DC Boon and GR Marsh, Aust v India, Jaipur, 1986-87. Previous best unbroken 1st wicket stand: 221 by Haynes, Lara and Richardson, West Indies v Pakistan, Melbourne, 1992 World Cup.)

milestones.description: Otieno has become the top scorer for KENYA in ODIs with 318 runs, going past Steve Tikolo's 216
Otieno's 144 is the highest individual score in ODIs (for KENYA), surpassing Steve Tikolo's 96
Athar Ali Khan and Jahangir Alam's 35-run partnership is BAN's highest for the 2nd wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 28 between Sajjad Ahmed and Habibul Bashar
Chudasama and Otieno's 225-run partnership is KENYA's highest for the 1st wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 47 between Chudasama and Otieno
Otieno and Steve Tikolo's 84-run partnership is KENYA's highest for the 2nd wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 53 between Chudasama and Otieno
Steve Tikolo has broken the record for most catches (5) in ODIs for KENYA, going past Tito Odumbe's 4
Chudasama has broken the record for most runs in boundaries (64) in an innings in ODIs for KENYA, going past Steve Tikolo's 56
Chudasama has broken the record for playing the most ODIs (10) for KENYA, going past Aasif Karim
Sheikh Salahuddin has conceded the most runs in an innings (80) in ODIs for BAN, going past Enamul Haque's record of 72
Chudasama and Otieno's 225-run partnership is KENYA's highest for any wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 137 between Hitesh Modi and Steve Tikolo
Chudasama and Otieno's 225-run partnership is the highest for the 1st wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 212 between David Boon and Geoff Marsh
